tool_input.command:
base_url="http://106.37.170.238:8232"
urls=(

"/interview"

"/skills/bazi"
"/skills/zodiac"
"/report"
"/report/123"
"/membership"
"/checkout/cs_test"
"/payment/success"
"/payment/cancel"
)

echo "| Route | Status | Title / Redirect |"
echo "|-------|--------|------------------|"

for path in "${urls[@]}"; do
  url="${base_url}${path}"
  # Get status code and effective URL (to check redirects)
  # Also try to grep title from body
  
  response=$(curl -sL -w "%{http_code}|%{url_effective}" -o /tmp/page_content "$url")
  status=${response%|*}
  effective_url=${response#*|}
  
  title=$(grep -oP '(?<=<title>).*?(?=</title>)' /tmp/page_content | head -1)
  
  # Check if redirected
  redirect_info=""
  if [[ "$url" != "$effective_url" ]]; then
      redirect_info=" (-> ${effective_url#$base_url})"
  fi
  
  echo "| $path | $status | ${title}${redirect_info} |"
done
